name: PublishingService

methods.name: archiveOnlineArticle
methods.signature: public static Void archiveOnlineArticle(String articleId, Datetime scheduledDate)
methods.description: Archives an online version of an article. If the specified scheduledDate is null, the article is archived immediately. Otherwise, it archives the article on the scheduled date.

methods.name: assignDraftArticleTask
methods.signature: public static Void assignDraftArticleTask(String articleId, String assigneeId, String instructions, Datetime dueDate, Boolean sendEmailNotification)
methods.description: Assigns a review task related to a draft article.

methods.name: assignDraftTranslationTask
methods.signature: public static Void assignDraftTranslationTask(String articleVersionId, String assigneeId, String instructions, Datetime dueDate, Boolean sendEmailNotification)
methods.description: Assigns a review task related to a draft translation.

methods.name: cancelScheduledArchivingOfArticle
methods.description: Cancels the scheduled archiving of an online article.

methods.name: cancelScheduledPublicationOfArticle
methods.description: Cancels the scheduled publication of a draft article.

methods.name: completeTranslation
methods.description: Puts a translation in a completed state that is ready to publish.

methods.name: deleteArchivedArticleVersion
methods.signature: public static Void deleteArchivedArticleVersion(String articleId, Integer versionNumber)
methods.description: Deletes a specific version of an archived article.

methods.name: editArchivedArticle
methods.description: Creates a draft article from the archived master version and returns the new draft master version ID of the article.

methods.name: editOnlineArticle
methods.signature: public static String editOnlineArticle(String articleId, Boolean unpublish)
methods.description: Creates a draft article from the online version and  returns the new draft master version ID of the article. Also, unpublishes the online article, if unpublish is set to true.

methods.name: editPublishedTranslation
methods.signature: public static String editPublishedTranslation(String articleId, String language, Boolean unpublish)
methods.description: Creates a draft version of the online translation for a specific language and returns the new draft master version ID of the article. Also, unpublishes the article, if set to true.

methods.name: publishArticle
methods.signature: public static Void publishArticle(String articleId, Boolean flagAsNew)
methods.description: Publishes an article. If flagAsNew is set to true, the article is published as a major version.

methods.name: restoreOldVersion
methods.signature: public static String restoreOldVersion(String articleId, Integer versionNumber)
methods.description: Creates a draft article from an existing online article based on the specified archived version of the article and returns the article version ID.

methods.name: scheduleForPublication
methods.signature: public static Void scheduleForPublication(String articleId, Datetime scheduledDate)
methods.description: Schedules the article for publication as a major version. If the specified date is null, the article is published immediately.

methods.name: setTranslationToIncomplete
methods.description: Sets a draft translation that is ready for publication back to “in progress” status.

methods.name: submitForTranslation
methods.signature: public static String submitForTranslation(String articleId, String language, String assigneeId, Datetime dueDate)
methods.description: Submits an article for translation to the specified language. Also assigns the specified user and due date to the submittal and returns new ID of the draft translation.

description: Use the methods in the KbManagement.PublishingService class to manage the lifecycle of an article and its translations.
